about_the_game:
Loki is up to no good, as always. Having thrown a wild party that has left much of Asgard in ruin, he avoided punishment for his misdeeds by deceiving Oden into believing that Thor was responsible for the damage. Oden's rage was extreme, leaving him unable to be reasoned with, and his punishment upon Thor was severe. Now stripped of all his power except the ability to move the wind, you play as Thor, tirelessly working to repay his debts to regain his powers, one delivery at a time.

Enjoy:

  • 2D/3D platforming over 40 levels spread across 6 different zones

  • Physics based gameplay (use the power of wind to deliver your package as fast as you can)

  • Compete against others for the best times with global leaderboards

  • Lore that will blow your socks off
detailed_description:
Loki is up to no good, as always. Having thrown a wild party that has left much of Asgard in ruin, he avoided punishment for his misdeeds by deceiving Oden into believing that Thor was responsible for the damage. Oden's rage was extreme, leaving him unable to be reasoned with, and his punishment upon Thor was severe. Now stripped of all his power except the ability to move the wind, you play as Thor, tirelessly working to repay his debts to regain his powers, one delivery at a time.

Enjoy:

  • 2D/3D platforming over 40 levels spread across 6 different zones

  • Physics based gameplay (use the power of wind to deliver your package as fast as you can)

  • Compete against others for the best times with global leaderboards

  • Lore that will blow your socks off

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2016
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, x86_64 CPU, ARMv7 or ARMv8 CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full Vulkan 1.0 support
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2020
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, x86_64 CPU, ARMv7 or ARMv8 CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full Vulkan 1.2 support
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.15
  • Processor: x86_64 or ARM CPU (Apple Silicon)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full Vulkan 1.0 support
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.15
  • Processor: x86_64 or ARM CPU (Apple Silicon)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full Vulkan 1.2 support
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

name: Thor's Delivery Service

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, x86_64 CPU, ARMv8 CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full Vulkan 1.0 support
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x86_64 CPU with SSE4.2 instructions, with 4 physical cores or more, ARMv8 CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full Vulkan 1.2 support
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Thor, blamed for destruction in Asgard that he was not apart of and summarily stripped of his power, has now been forced to take up work to repay his debts to regain his powers, one delivery at a time.
